function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of SARS-CoV-2 virus","Impact":"Overwhelmed health systems, economic downturn, and societal impact","Mitigation":"Enforcement of nonpharmacological practices, social distancing, and isolation measures","Technologies":"Contact tracing, temperature screening, and testing technology","People":"General population, especially those at higher risk","Owner":"Government, healthcare systems, and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Absence of COVID-19 treatment and delayed availability of vaccine","Impact":"Continued high rates of infection and significant health burden","Mitigation":"Research and development of antiviral treatments, vaccine development, and nonpharmacological practices","Technologies":"Vaccine development, antiviral therapies, and nonpharmacological prevention strategies","People":"General population, especially those at higher risk","Owner":"Government, research institutions, pharmaceutical companies"},{"Description":"Spread of misinformation due to social distancing measures","Impact":"Negative impact on psychological wellbeing, dissemination of false information, and public panic","Mitigation":"Promotion of accurate information, mental health support, and community engagement","Technologies":"Social media monitoring, mental health services, and public communication platforms","People":"Vulnerable populations, general population","Owner":"Government, mental health organizations, and community organizations"}]}
